title: The Kokiri's Chosen
description: Link awakens in Kokiri Forest, receiving his fairy Navi and the quest to meet the Great Deku Tree.

title: First Guardian Falls
description: The Great Deku Tree reveals Ganondorf's betrayal before dying, sending Link to Hyrule Castle.

title: Princess in Disguise
description: Link meets Zelda disguised as a Sheikah, who warns of Ganondorf's plot through her window.

title: Goron's Trial
description: Link saves the Gorons from starvation by defeating Dodongo's Cavern boss King Dodongo.

title: Zora's Domain Frozen
description: Link thaws Zora's Domain and retrieves the Spiritual Stone from Lord Jabu-Jabu.

title: Door of Time Opened
description: With all three Spiritual Stones, Link opens the sacred door and draws the Master Sword.

title: Seven Year Slumber
description: Link awakens as an adult to find Hyrule devastated by Ganondorf's rule.

title: Forest Temple Liberated
description: Adult Link frees the Forest Temple from evil, awakening Sage Saria.

title: Fire Temple's Fury
description: Link rescues the Gorons from Volvagia in Death Mountain's fiery depths.

title: Water Temple Trials
description: In Zora's flooded ruins, Link battles Dark Link and Morpha to free Ruto.

title: Shadow Temple Secrets
description: Link navigates the haunted Shadow Temple to awaken Impa as a Sage.

title: Spirit Temple Duality
description: Using time travel, Link completes both child/adult phases of the Spirit Temple.

title: Light Sage Awakened
description: Zelda reveals herself as the final Sage in Ganondorf's captured castle.

title: Final Confrontation
description: Link battles Ganondorf through multiple phases: human, beast, and cosmic forms.

title: Era Sealed
description: Zelda returns Link to his childhood, creating a split timeline and peace restored.
